targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM("NetUnits"), REPLACE("Country", 'Russian Federation', 'Russia') as "Country" FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" GROUP BY "Country"

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("Date",$__interval),
  sum("Adds") - sum("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") - SUM("Gifts")
FROM steampartner."WishlistActions"
WHERE
  "Game" = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("Date",$__interval),
  sum("Adds") - sum("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") - SUM("Gifts")
FROM steampartner."WishlistActions"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Date") AND
  "Game" = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("Date", $__interval),
  sum("NetUnits")
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales"
WHERE
   "Game" = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("Date", $__interval),
  sum("NetUnits")
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("Date") AND 
   "Game" = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT 100.0 * SUM("ChargebackAndReturns") / SUM("GrossUnits") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value"
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE
  "Game" = '$games'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Date" as time,
  "FollowerAmount"
FROM steampartner."SteamFollowers"
WHERE "GameName" = '$games'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  "Date",
  (SELECT SUM("Deletes") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as deleted,
  (SELECT SUM("Adds") - SUM("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as active, 
  (SELECT SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as purchased
FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" 
WHERE "Game" = '$games' AND
  $__timeFilter("Date")

SELECT 
  "Date",
  (100 * deleted / (deleted + active + purchased)) as deleted,
  (100 * active / (deleted + active + purchased)) as active,
  (100 * purchased / (deleted + active + purchased)) as purchased
FROM (
  SELECT 
    "Date",
    (SELECT SUM("Deletes") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as deleted,
    (SELECT SUM("Adds") - SUM("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as active, 
    (SELECT SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" b WHERE b."Date" <= steampartner."WishlistActions"."Date" AND b."Game" = steampartner."WishlistActions"."Game") as purchased
  FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" 
  WHERE "Game" = '$games' AND
    $__timeFilter("Date")
) a
WHERE (deleted + active + purchased) > 0

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM("Adds") - SUM("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") - SUM("Gifts") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  "Game" as "metric"
FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  "FollowerAmount" as "value",
  "GameName" as "metric"
FROM steampartner."SteamFollowers" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

matcher.options: Alchemistry ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)
Extortion ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM("NetUnits") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  CONCAT("Game", ' (net units)') as "metric"
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM("USDNetSteamSales") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  CONCAT("Game", ' ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)') as "metric"
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM("USDGrossSteamSales") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  CONCAT("Game", ' ($ gross)') as "metric"
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Copies sold | Net $ sold before taxes & steam cut
Stats from day 0 (public page or release date)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ("Date" - (SELECT MIN("Date") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" WHERE "Game" = currquery."Game" AND "Adds" != 0)) AS "day",
  (SELECT SUM("Adds") - SUM("Deletes") - SUM("PurchasesAndActivations") FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  "Game" as metric
FROM steampartner."WishlistActions" as currquery
WHERE "Adds" != 0 OR "Deletes" != 0
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT
  ("Date" - (SELECT MIN("Date") FROM steampartner."SteamFollowers" WHERE "GameName" = currquery."GameName")) AS "day",
  "FollowerAmount" as "value",
  "GameName" as metric
FROM steampartner."SteamFollowers" as currquery
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT DISTINCT
  ("Date" - (SELECT MIN("Date") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" WHERE "Game" = currquery."Game" AND "NetUnits" != 0)) AS "day",
  (SELECT SUM("NetUnits") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  "Game" as metric
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE "NetUnits" != 0
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT
  "Date" AS "time",
  (SELECT 100.0 * SUM("ChargebackAndReturns") / SUM("GrossUnits") FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as subquery WHERE subquery."Date" <= currquery."Date" and subquery."Game" = currquery."Game") as "value",
  CONCAT("Game", ' (% return)') as "metric"
FROM steampartner."PackagesSales" as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery."Date")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  a."Date" as "time",
  SUM(b."USDGrossSteamSales") AS "Gross ($)",
  SUM(b."USDNetSteamSales") AS "Net ($)"
FROM (SELECT distinct "Date" FROM steampartner."PackagesSales") a
INNER JOIN steampartner."PackagesSales" b ON b."Date" BETWEEN (a."Date" - interval '364 days') AND a."Date"
WHERE $__timeFilter(a."Date") 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  a."Date" as "time",
  SUM(b."GrossUnits") AS "Gross Units",
  SUM(b."NetUnits") AS "Net Units"
FROM (SELECT distinct "Date" FROM steampartner."PackagesSales") a
INNER JOIN steampartner."PackagesSales" b ON b."Date" BETWEEN (a."Date" - interval '364 days') AND a."Date"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC
